com.vernalis.knime.internal.flowcontrol

Class FlowControlHelpers

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vernalis.knime.internal.flowcontrol.FlowControlHelpers

  • public class FlowControlHelpers
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class to provide shared methods for flow control nodes such as if, end if etc. Methods are for checking for, finding, returning active or inactive ports, and for generating the PortObjects to create nodes simply Most methods are duplicated for PortObjects and PortObjectSpecs to allow their use in both NodeModel#configure and #execute methods
    Author:
    "Stephen Roughley "

      • createEndInPorts

        public static org.knime.core.node.port.PortType[] createEndInPorts(org.knime.core.node.port.PortType type,
                                                   int portCount)
        Utility method to create the in ports to an inactive branch end node. If less than two input ports are specified, two are created. If there are only 2 input ports, both are required, otherwise only the first is required and additional ports are optional
        Parameters:
        type - The PortType of the ports to be created (e.g FlowVariablePortObject.TYPE)
        portCount - The number of input ports to be created
        Returns:
        the port type[]

      • createEndInPorts

        public static org.knime.core.node.port.PortType[] createEndInPorts(java.lang.Class<? extends org.knime.core.node.port.PortObject> type,
                                                   int portCount)
        Utility method to create the in ports to an inactive branch end node. If less than two input ports are specified, two are created. If there are only 2 input ports, both are required, otherwise only the first is required and additional ports are optional
        Parameters:
        type - The PortObject class of the ports to be created (e.g FlowVariablePortObject)
        portCount - The number of input ports to be created
        Returns:
        the port type[]

      • createStartOutputPortObjectSpec

        public static org.knime.core.node.port.PortObjectSpec[] createStartOutputPortObjectSpec(org.knime.core.node.port.PortObjectSpec[] inSpecs,
                                                                        int numPorts,
                                                                        int activePortIdx)
                                                                                 throws org.knime.core.node.InvalidSettingsException
        Utility function to pass the active inport PortObjectSpec to the active outport, and set the other outports to be InactiveBranchPortObjectSpec.INSTANCE.
        Parameters:
        inSpecs - PortObjectSpec array of the input port specs
        numPorts - The total number of ports to create
        activePortIdx - The index of the active outport
        Returns:
        PortObjectSpec array of the output port specs
        Throws:
        org.knime.core.node.InvalidSettingsException - Thrown if the active port ID < 0 or >= the number of output ports

      • createStartOutputPortObject

        public static org.knime.core.node.port.PortObject[] createStartOutputPortObject(org.knime.core.node.port.PortObject[] inData,
                                                                int numPorts,
                                                                int activePortIdx)
                                                                         throws org.knime.core.node.InvalidSettingsException
        Utility function to pass the active inport PortObject to the active outport, and set the other outports to be InactiveBranchPortObject.INSTANCE.
        Parameters:
        inData - the in data
        numPorts - The total number of ports to create
        activePortIdx - The index of the active outport
        Returns:
        PortObject array of the output ports
        Throws:
        org.knime.core.node.InvalidSettingsException - Thrown if the active port ID < 0 or >= the number of output ports

      • createStartOutputPortObjectSpecs

        public static org.knime.core.node.port.PortObjectSpec[] createStartOutputPortObjectSpecs(org.knime.core.node.port.PortObjectSpec[] inSpecs,
                                                                         int numPorts,
                                                                         java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> activePortIdx)
                                                                                  throws org.knime.core.node.InvalidSettingsException
        Utility function to pass the active inport PortObjectSpec to the active outport(s), and set the other outports to be InactiveBranchPortObjectSpec.INSTANCE. Takes a list of active ports but otherwise is the same as createStartOutputPortObjectSpec(PortObjectSpec[], int, int)
        Parameters:
        inSpecs - PortObjectSpec array of the input port specs
        numPorts - The total number of ports to create
        activePortIdx - List of indices of active ports
        Returns:
        PortObjectSpec array of the output port specs
        Throws:
        org.knime.core.node.InvalidSettingsException - Thrown if the active port ID < 0 or >= the number of output

      • createStartOutputPortObjects

        public static org.knime.core.node.port.PortObject[] createStartOutputPortObjects(org.knime.core.node.port.PortObject[] inData,
                                                                 int numPorts,
                                                                 java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> activePortIdx)
                                                                          throws org.knime.core.node.InvalidSettingsException
        Utility function to pass the active inport PortObject to the active outport(s), and set the other outports to be InactiveBranchPortObject.INSTANCE. Takes a list of active ports but otherwise is the same as createStartOutputPortObject(PortObject[], int, int)
        Parameters:
        inData - PortObject array of the input port specs
        numPorts - The total number of ports to create
        activePortIdx - List of indices of active ports
        Returns:
        PortObject array of the output port specs
        Throws:
        org.knime.core.node.InvalidSettingsException - Thrown if the active port ID < 0 or >= the number of output

      • createTimedEndPorts

        public static org.knime.core.node.port.PortType[] createTimedEndPorts(org.knime.core.node.port.PortType type,
                                                      int numPorts)
        Create the output ports for a timed loop end node. NB Adds 1 extra port for the unprocessed rows
        Parameters:
        type - The Port Type
        numPorts - The number of INPUT ports (i.e. one less than the number of output ports!)
        Returns:
        PortType array

      • createTimedEndOptionalInPorts

        public static org.knime.core.node.port.PortType[] createTimedEndOptionalInPorts(org.knime.core.node.port.PortType type,
                                                                int portCount)
        Utility method to create the in ports to an timed loop end node. If there are only 2 input ports, both are required, otherwise only the first is required and additional ports are optional
        Parameters:
        type - The PortType of the ports to be created (e.g FlowVariablePortObject.TYPE)
        portCount - The number of input ports to be created
        Returns:
        the port type[]
